Rampage stops with Tankorr, Inferno, and Scourge
Rampage: We should probably wait here until we are contacted by Hell Beast or 
someone finds us.
Inferno: A lot of strange things have been happening. What if the Royalty 
needs us.
Rampage: Then he will contact us.
Scourge goes to beast to make internal repairs.
